summary: This module contains a comprehensive suite of unit tests for the particle handling classes in the library. The tests verify correct initialization, property values, category handling, inversion behavior, equality, JSON serialization/deserialization, error and warning raising, and interaction with custom particle definitions and molecules.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and robustness of the particle representation API, preventing regressions and ensuring that physical attributes, categorization, and data interchange functions behave as expected for scientific plasma simulations.
